title: Garnier - Ambre Solaire - Sun Protection Milk 200ml - SPF 20
description:
Ambre Solaire Sollotion SPF 20 is a protecting, effective and moisturizing sun lotion with SPF 20 protection. This Sun milk adds a lot of moisture to the skin with a high protection. It has a moisturizing formula, that protects the skin against dryness caused by the sun and makes your skin soft and smooth. Protects against sunburning and helps to prevent photoageing caused by the sunrays. Apply the protect before you go out in the sun. Apply generous amounts, at least a handfull, specially after bathing. It has Garnier's patented Mexoryl filtre, which absorbs UVA and UVB rays.

Application:

  • Apply on clean and dry skin 15 minutes before sun exposion
  • Reapply after contact with water
  • Apply at least every second hour

Benefits:

  • Sunscreen with SPF 20 protection
  • Hydrating sunscreen
  • Quickly absorbed
  • Protects against UVA and UVB rays
  • Has Mexoryl filtre
  • Water resistent

18 V / 2.5 Ah Kärcher Battery Power battery with innovative Real Time Technology. Incl. LCD display to show battery level. For use in all Kärcher's 18 V Battery Power battery platform devices.

The Kärcher 18 V / 2.5 Ah Battery Power battery is for use in all devices in the Kärcher 18 V Battery Power battery platform. Thanks to innovative Real Time Technology and an LCD display, the remaining operating time, remaining charging time and charging level are always visible. title: Estée Lauder - Knowing 30 ml. EDP
description:
Estée Lauder Knowing Eau de Parfum is a warm, spicy and elegant woody scent for a sophisticated and self-confident woman.
The top notes begin with the floral freshness of mimoza, pittosporum, sweet rose and tuberose, combined with sparkling fruty notes of plum and melon. There are floral notes mingling with a sweet woodsy note of patchouli and iris and spicy clove and laurel. The chypre base includes sandalwood, vetiver, patchouli, oakmoss and civet.
Knowing can be used by women at all ages, but the biggest group of buyers are women from 35 years.

Eau de Parfum
Eau de Parfum is composed of 10-20% aromatic compounds. This means that 10-20% of the perfume is made of perfume oils, while 80-90% is alcohol. The typical Eau de Parfum is 15% perfume.

Eau de Parfum has a stronger and longer lasting scent than Eau de Toilette. it is more concentrated and has strong heart notes that linger after the top notes have faded away.
Apply the eau de parfum to pulse point so that the fragrance has an opportunity to blossom upwards around you.

Estée Lauder
Estée Lauder founded this company in 1946 armed with four products and an unshakeable belief: that every woman can be beautiful.
Today, more than 60 years later, that simple notion has literally changed the face of the beauty business.

title: Arthur and the Invisibles
description:
"The game allows players to re-live the fantastic adventures of young Arthur and his two pals, Selenia and Bétamèche, in their mission to save the Minimoys' world from destruction.
The game is based on the world of Luc Besson's Arthur and the Minimoys and follows the gripping story of the film, with all the richness and extraordinary visuals of the Arthur universe.
Game play is based on the concept of the ""trio"" - each phase of a puzzle or combat requires utilizing the skills of all three characters (Arthur, Selenia and Bétamèche).
Each character has unique but complementary powers which players must use to their advantage. The three heroes have their own specific objectives, but they must also aid one other.
Players can watch integrated scenes from the film offered in the form of parallel action phases.

"

title: Benefit - Gimme Brow & Go Set
description:
Effective gel that gives life to color and toning

The Gimme Brow Volumizing Fiber Gel duo set from Benefit consists of two gels with good control that color and tone your eyebrows. Enriched with small microfibers, the gel adheres to skin and hair, creating beautiful, well-defined and natural eyebrows with fullness. With a nice, dark color that is easily distributed, the gel creates voluminous eyebrows that are suitable for thin and light eyebrows that want a clear definition. You can give the other gel to a friend or bring it on the go, so you always have big and beautiful eyebrows ready at hand.

Application:

  • Apply the product to the eyebrows.

  • Work inside out so you follow the hairs.

  • Stroke along eyebrows to shape and define.

  • If desired, apply several coats for a darker, intense color.

Advantages:

  • Wonderful eyebrow gel by Benefit.

  • Defines eyebrows.

  • Creates volume.

  • Gives a natural look.

  • Suitable for thin and light eyebrows.

  • Good control.

  • 2 x 3g gel.

title: House Of Cards - Season 3
description: Series 3 of the drama about a ruthless congressman and his equally ambitious wife who navigate the corridors of power in Washington, D.C. It begins with Frank as President of the United States after his recent inauguration and continues with him trying to maintain a hold on his country and those around him trying to run it.

title: House Of Cards - Season 4
description: Series 4 opens with Frank and Claire still at odds with each other. Claire's determination to be a political figure puts Frank's campaign and marriage in jeopardy. Meanwhile Frank battles for the Democratic Party nomination and seeks a suitable running mate. While the young attractive Conservative candidate Will Conway uses social media to increase his popularity. Lucas is let out of prison and will stop at nothing to expose the truth about President Underwood.

title: Dr. Bronner's - Bar Soap Eucalyptus 140 g
description:
Dr. Bronner’s Pure-Castile Bar Soap Eucalyptus formula is vegan and organic. Mild, efficient and kind - will not dry your skin. The best from our liquid soaps in a bar. The scent is milder than the liquid soap as it contains less essential oils. It is also more moisturizing due to a different formulation of oils and salt (which makes our bar soaps solid). A combination of organic extra virgin coconut, palm, jojoba, and hemp oils, together with pure essential oils, creates a unique soap that cleans effectively without being abrasive and produces a velvety lather that leaves the skin silky-smooth and refreshed. This versatile soap can be used for hands, body, face and hair. 

Wellness for every bathroom! This soap transforms any bathroom into a spa because, thanks to the typical sauna scent of eucalyptus, a sense of restoration will kick in within minutes. And, entirely apart from this pleasantly piquant fragrance, the organic essential oil works thoroughly for your wellbeing because it opens the pores and clears the head and the sinuses. The base recipe of organic coconut, olive, palm kernel, hemp, and jojoba oils does the rest. Whether you use it in the morning for a blast of power or in the evenings to help you relax – this soap has something for every wellness type.

Application:

  • Good for washing hands, body, face or hair! Use as needed. 

Benefits:

  • Soap bar
  • Citrus and orange fragrance
  • Mild
  • Moisturize
  • For hands, body, face and hair

Love it, love it not? Roses are tricky: They can be a beautiful declaration of love, or awkwardly kitschy. The scent of roses is similar. In its original form, it’s the sweetest scent you can imagine. But many of the rose fragrances out there are far too overpowering, heavy and, above all, too sweet. Anybody who has sniffed a real rose will know that its fragrance is exactly the opposite. As is our natural Rose soap which has a base recipe composed of organic coconut, olive, palm kernel, hemp, and jojoba oils, refined with natural rose fragrance. It is flowery without being sweet, powerful without being heavy, and romantic without being kitschy.

Because we’ve added deliciously stimulating organic lemon-orange essential oil to our soap’s base recipe of organic coconut, olive, palm kernel, hemp, and jojoba oils. Have you every freshened up your skin with citrus fruits before? No? Then it’s high time you did!

Application:

  • Good for washing hands, body, face or hair! Use as needed. 

Benefits:

  • Soap bar
  • Citrus and orange fragrance
  • Mild
  • Moisturize
  • For hands, body, face and hair

title: Dr. Bronner's - Bar Soap Citrus Orange 140 g
description:
Dr. Bronner’s Pure-Castile Bar Soap Citrus-Orange formula is vegan and organic. Mild, efficient and kind - will not dry your skin. The best from our liquid soaps in a bar. The scent is milder than the liquid soap as it contains less essential oils. It is also more moisturizing due to a different formulation of oils and salt (which makes our bar soaps solid). A combination of organic extra virgin coconut, palm, jojoba, and hemp oils, together with pure essential oils, creates a unique soap that cleans effectively without being abrasive and produces a velvety lather that leaves the skin silky-smooth and refreshed. This versatile soap can be used for hands, body, face and hair.

title: Dr. Bronner's - Bar Soap Baby Mild
description:
Dr. Bronner’s Pure-Castile Bar Soap Baby Mild (unscented) formula is vegan and organic. Mild, efficient and kind - will not dry your skin. The best from our liquid soaps in a bar. The Baby Mild bar soap is unscented as it doesn't contain essential oils. Compared to the liquid soap it is more moisturizing due to a different formulation of oils and salt (which makes our bar soaps solid). A combination of organic extra virgin coconut, palm, jojoba, and hemp oils, creates a unique soap that cleans effectively without being abrasive and produces a velvety lather that leaves the skin silky-smooth and refreshed. This versatile soap can be used for hands, body, face and hair.  That makes Baby Mild natural soap ideal for people with allergies and ultra sensitive skin. Because we don’t use any chemical additives, you should avoid getting this pure soap in your eyes. 

Soft as a baby’s bottom! Developed with the sensitivity of baby skin in mind, this soap is a loyal companion for anybody whose skin needs extra care. That’s why we haven’t included essential oils for fragrance, but have added a particularly high proportion of pure organic olive oil to our standard composition of organic coconut, olive, palm kernel, hemp, and jojoba oils. That makes Baby Mild natural soap ideal for people with allergies and ultra sensitive skin. Because we don’t use any chemical additives, you should avoid getting this pure soap in your eyes.

title: Dr. Bronner's - Bar Soap  Almond
description:

This versatile soap can be used for hands, body, face and hair. 

The freshes almonds ever! Apart from the wonderful warmth that the scent of almonds exudes, these nuts have a very fresh and piquant fragrance, almost like marzipan without the sugar. Using our base recipe composed of organic coconut, olive, palm kernel, hemp, and jojoba oils, we’ve added natural almond fragrance to this soap to give you a nurturing and fragrant experience that offers a winning combination of tenderness and vibrancy – because, after all, just being sweet is too easy…

The piquant miracle worker! Whether it’s for cuts or skin complaints like acne, dermatitis or psoriasis – organic tea tree oil really works magic; its antiseptic effect helps to cure or at least relieve. That’s a property that we also want to retain in our natural Tea Tree soap with its base recipe of organic coconut, olive, palm kernel, hemp, and jojoba oils. It has a highly distinctive fragrance and a delicious natural piquancy. Once you’ve taken it into your heart, you’ll never want to be without it again.

Application:

title: Tiny Love - Spin Ball
description:
Give your child a colorful and fun activity toy that will develop motor skills. The little figure inside would peep out and disappear, making for a fun discovery for your child.

Let your child have hours of entertainment with this activity toy from Tiny Love. The ball challenges your child to move forward, and stretch to reach the ball. The colors and shapes give your child visual stimulation, and develops motor skills. A fun and colorful toy for the little ones.

Product info:

  • Spin ball from Tiny Love

  • Beautiful colours

  • Removable exterior panels

  • Mirror panels on the inside

  • Recommended age: 0 m +

title: Carolina Herrera - Good Girl Fantastic Pink EDP
description:
An incredibly warm, spicy and sweet perfume, both you and your surroundings can enjoy all day. The scent is rich in notes, which in this amount and composition are absolutely amazing. The notes include tonka bean, cocoa, almond, vanilla, bergamot, musk, cashmere, jasmine and pralines. The scent is perfect for you, if you are a fresh and bubbly type who will not hold back. The scent will send a signal that you are aware of what you want and that you dare to stand by yourself. The perfume is a beautiful design in a beautiful high pink style that will adorn any home, with its glamor and glitter.

Notes: 

  • Tonka bean, cocoa, almond, vanilla, bergamot, musk, cashmere, jasmine and pralines

title: Urage - Reaper 1000 Cordless Gaming Mouse
description:
This gaming mouse from Urage can be adapted to you, and ensures a gaming experience in high, ergonomic quality.

Reaper 1000 is a versatile and functional mouse that can be adapted to your needs. You can convert it to fit either the right or left hand, with a different weight or custom dpi. It is ideal to be able to customize your mouse depending on what game you are playing and what precision you need.

Included:

  • 1 "1,000 Morph unleashed" gaming mouse

  • 4 replaceable side pieces

  • 2 extra weights

  • 1 nano-USB dongle

  • 1 USB-C charger cable

  • 1 user manual

Specifications:

  • With the included weights, you can easily adjust the weight of the mouse

  • Compatible operating systems: Windows 10/8/7

  • Play'n'Charge: charge and play at the same time with the USB-C cable

  • Nano USB dongle: Simply store in the back of the mouse

  • Adjustable dpi up to 10,000 for precise mouse movements

  • Dpi button for quick mouse speed adjustment

  • Clear LED resolution

  • Full RGB lighting

  • For high performance: integrated Avago gaming sensor of 10,000 dpi

  • Long lasting Omron switches in high quality

  • Ergonomic design for 24/7 sessions

  • More grip thanks to non-slip coating

  • Teflon feet for smooth movements

  • 8 quick response keys (of which 8 can be programmed "in the game")

  • Incl. game software (macro programming, profile settings, lighting, etc.)

  • 1000 HZ USB tuning speed

  • Plug and play

EAN: 4047443421258

title: Targus - Groove X2 Compact Backpack - designed for Laptops up to 15” ( Charcoal )
description:
The perfect study or work companion, the Targus Groove X2 Compact Backpack offers tech-friendly MacBook or laptop storage with clever capacity for carrying your essentials.  Designed to fit and protect 15” MacBook and other devices up to 15” screen sizes, there is space and pockets for everyday stuff – your valuables, accessories, books & papers. High-denier water-repellent exterior with colour accents.

Features:

Clever internal capacity with separate storage spaces for your tech and everyday items.

Tech-friendly laptop cradle offers Targus’ Sling Protection™, it suspends your hardware inside to prevent drop-damage.

Large zipped compartment reveals multiple pockets inside for storing your everyday accessories.

title: Elodie Details - Cozy Cushion
description:
Add a touch of style and comfort to the stroller with CozyCushion from Elodie Details.

The pillow has openings for a 5-point harness and fits all types of strollers. CozyCushion is a super smart way to give new life and extra comfort to your old stroller.   • Has openings for 5-point belts and fits all types of strollers

description:

It is super easy to use and should only be sprayed onto a rondelle, and dried over the face.

  • Dry the rondelle over the face

title: Don King Boxing (For Balance Board)
description: Don King Presents: Prizefighter will bring the realism of live action match-ups and the true tactics of the sweet science together for the first time. title: Kärcher - WV 2 Plus N - Cordless WIndow Vac
description:
Easy and fast window cleaning without streaks and stops. The WV 2 Premium has a longer battery life and lower sound level than its predecessor. It comes with an extra, narrow mouthpiece for small videos.

The original, innovative Kärcher window washer makes window cleaning much easier. The battery operated window washer sucks away the dirty water, avoiding streaks on the windows and water in the window sills. Combining a spray bottle with microfiber cloth and a suction window scraper gives you an effective window cleaning with shiny clean windows as a result. You can use the window washer on any smooth surface - for example. mirrors, shower cubicles or glass tables. The new updated WV 2 Premium has 25% longer battery life than its predecessor, it fills and weighs less, has a lower sound level, and the container is even easier to drain from the dirty water. With WV 2 Premium also comes a narrower mouthpiece that you can use if you have e.g. French doors or farmhouse windows with very small windows.

title: Brutal Legend
description:
Work has been going around the clock and insiders close to Schafer have described Brütal Legend as the chronicle of Eddie Riggs, a roadie of a virtuous metal band, pulled back in time to learn his true purpose. Offered the wealth and knowledge of an ancient kingdom in exchange for assembling a legion of his own design, the roadie commands a barbaric mob of demons, dragsters, amp stacks, leather and chrome. Together they thunder across the land in the ultimate Tour of Destruction, driving the ancient world headlong into the Age of Metal.

Piecing the period of time when a divine society used raw materials of ROCK and hot rods which lay dormant in this land, experts at Double Fine also revealed the fantastic nature of this world where Big-block V8 engines were dug out of the ground like minerals. Exhaust pipes were cut from trees made of chrome and a luminous sky was lit up with heavenly lighters held up by the gods.

title: Slægten
description:
The film adaptation of Gustav Wieds' novel Slægten directed by Anders Refn.

Slægten is a Danish film from 1978 and tells the story of Baron Helmuth who owns an estate. He is unmarried and lives with his mother, the widowed baroness. He gets a new young wife Alvilda, the marriage does not end happily. Helmuth discovers that Alvilda is unfaithful to him, and takes a cruel revenge.

With, among others Poul Reichhardt, Bodil Udsen, Birgit Sadolin, Allan Olsen and Jens Okking.

description:
Asus - Rog Strix LC 360 RGB White Edition all-in-one liquid CPU cooler with Aura Sync

ROG Strix LC RGB high-performance CPU liquid coolers are perfect for RGB enthusiasts. They feature the same closed-loop design as our Strix LC series but with the added benefit of addressable RGB radiator fans – enabling you to unleash the full potential of your unlocked Intel or AMD CPU, while further accentuating your build with brilliant multi-colour lighting effects. With the performance, features and style you expect from ROG, Strix LC RGB coolers are ready to become an essential part of your gaming system.

Featuring the iconic ROG logo, signature slash on the pump housing and radiator that all glow with Aura RGB lighting, ROG Strix LC RGB series coolers add a vibrant burst of colour and sleek style at the heart of your build. The lighting colour and effects can be customised to match your system's colours for a unified look that's totally your own.

ROG Ryujin is the flagship all-in-one cooler for high-end builds designed to deliver the best thermal performance. Featuring Noctua IndustrialPPC fans for cooler and quieter operation, plus an embedded fan in the pump housing for additional cooling to the VRM and M.2, ROG Ryujin keeps your system running its absolute best. Coupled with a LiveDash OLED that displays system stats or custom graphics and Aura Sync RGB lighting, ROG Ryujin is the ultimate thermal solution destined to become a vital part of your gaming rig

ROG Ryujin meets the thermal challenges of the latest multi-core CPUs with industrial-grade Noctua iPPC-2000 PWM fans on the radiator that deliver high performance and low-noise operation. The 120-mm fans generate 122 CFM of airflow at 2,000 RPM yet are extremely efficient with a 29.7-dB(A) acoustic footprint that's much quieter than competing fans.

title: Asus - Rog Strix 850G Platinum Power Supply Unit
description:
Asus - Rog Strix 850G Platinum Power Supply Unit

The ROG Strix Series PSUs bring high-end cooling and premium components together for an ultra-quiet high-performance product aimed at core gamers. Massive ROG heatsinks trickle down from the mighty ROG Thor series and Axial-tech fan design from our premium NVIDIA RTX graphics cards also make an appearance. Below the surface, low RDS (on) MOSFETs and premium Japanese capacitors take on power delivery with ease. The result is an incredibly quiet and efficient power supply with the reserves to handle the most intense gaming scenarios.

Heart of gold
Top-end Japanese capacitors ensure efficient operation and have helped the Strix earn an 80 PLUS Gold certification. The increased efficiency also results in less heat, reducing noise and increasing reliability.

Features:

  • ROG heatsinks cover critical components, delivering lower temperatures and reduced noise.
  • Axial-tech fan design features a smaller fan hub that facilitates longer blades and a barrier ring that increases downward air pressure.
  • Dual ball fan bearings can last up to twice as long as sleeve bearing designs.
  • 0dB Technology lets you enjoy light gaming in relative silence.
  • An 80 Plus Gold Certification is the result of Japanese capacitors and other premium components.
  • Cosmetic customisation is enabled by a magnetic logo and stickers that help you reskin the visible side to your liking.
  • Fully modular cables keep your rig neat and tidy.

Specifications:

  • Intel Specification: ATX 12V
  • Dimensions: 16 x 18 x 8.6 Centimeter
  • Efficiency: 80Plus Gold
  • Protection Features: OPP/OVP/SCP/OCP/OTP
  • Hazardous Materials: ROHS
  • AC Input Range: 100-240Vac
  • Thermal Features: ROG Thermal Solution
  • Fan Size: 135 mm
  • DC Output Voltage: +3.3V +5V +12V -12V +5Vsb
  • Maximum Load: 20A 20A 70A 0.3A 3A

title: BenQ - Zowie XL2740 240Hz 1ms Shield  Gaming Monitor 27"
description:
This FreeSync monitor is among the first "G-sync compatible" monitors, certified by NVIDIA
G-SYNC Compatible testing validates that the monitor does not show blanking, pulsing, flickering, ghosting or other artifacts during VRR gaming. They also validate that the monitor can operate in VRR at any game frame rate by supporting a VRR range of at least 2.4:1 (e.g. 60Hz-144Hz), and offer the gamer a seamless experience by enabling VRR by default.

No Doubts, No Limits.
XL-series features the premiere monitors for PC e-Sports, fine-tuned to guarantee the smoothest and responsive experience, and the clearest images to arm you for competition.

Native 240Hz Refresh Rate – Smoothness Evolution
Catch every detail of motion and enjoy the most fluid gameplay by ZOWIE native 240Hz refresh rate monitor, which ensures a flawless view of fast-motion and dramatic transitions consistently at all time. (Please make sure the PC performance is up to par to fully activate 240Hz)
Recommended Video Card Requirement:
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 or better
AMD Radeon RX 480 or better

Shield – Helps You Focus On The Game
Shield - reveal the way to be concentrated in games. The adjustable angle and removable design allows Shield to adopt various environments according to preference. Just focus on winning the game.

Spot Hidden Enemies
Never fall victim to some cowardly camper in a dark corner again. Black eQualizer increases the visibility in dark scenes without overexposing the bright areas. You can also use it to fine tune your preferred black balance under low brightness setting for a comfort viewing.

Optimize Gaming Precision

title: Lord of Arcana Slayer Edition
description:
This world is called Horodyn, so named for its first king. At the edge of a village surrounded by a huge forest lies the powerful stone Arcana, the source of all order in the world. It is said that only one with power can acquire Arcana. Slayers annihilate hordes of monsters so that they could lay their hands on Arcana. What power does it hold within? And to what destiny is one with Arcana bound?

  • Incredible visuals that push PSP to the limit 
  • Monster designs by a collaboration of world-renowned artists 
  • Thrilling combat lets you instantly create stunning and devastating attacks to decimate your enemies 
  • Create and customise unique weapons and armour to tailor your own unique warrior 
  • 4-player Ad-hoc mode lets you team-up with friends for hours of adventure 
  • Huge diversity of missions for hours of gaming solo or with friends 
  • Ongoing DLC content for exciting new missions

A lovelyv deep-cleansing shampoo for oily scalp. This shampoo effectively cleanses your hair of dirt, product residue and oils, leaving it clean and fresh. The shampoo is enriched with citramine, which cleanses your scalp and hair free of excess oils. In addition, the shampoo adds renewed shine to the hair as well as making it more enjoyable to work with. L'Oréal - Pure Rescue Shampoo is an effective and great shampoo that cleanses the hair thoroughly, leaving the hair lovely and healthy.
